SELECT c.commodityName,c.commodityNo,SUM(t.commodityNum) saleNum,c.salePrice/100 salePrice,c.inPrice/100 inPrice FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_order_detail t ON c.commodityName=t.commodityName WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( c.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') OR c.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') )
GROUP BY c.commodityNo,c.commodityName,c.salePrice/100,c.inPrice/100
